description: This file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface. It provides methods for managing a local SQLite database, including opening a database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries and counts, removing entries, and adding entries. It includes necessary headers and references external components like DatabaseConnection and ILocalStore.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing the ILocalStore interface, managing local database operations.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a database table with the given name.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within the specified range from a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves entries from a table starting at a position with a specified count.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
